XenotypeDef.label: Pure Humans
XenotypeDef.description: Pure humans are rareâ€”descendants of vault-born bloodlines, preserved genetics, or sheer luck. They see themselves as the last unbroken line of humanity, though in a world reborn through mutation, that purity can be a curse. To some, they are relics; to others, they are hope made flesh.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Unaffected descendants of the old world, clinging to their unmutated humanity.
